revised_title: A Study of Ovarian Deficiency in a Full-Grown Woman
tldr: This case study examines a woman with deficient ovaries, who never experienced puberty or menstruation. The woman's physical and physiological characteristics are described, and the internal structure of her reproductive organs is analyzed after her death. The findings provide insights into the development and function of the reproductive system.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Human Physiology
